column2: BRIEF-Bank Of Hawaii Corp Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.28 April 23 (Reuters) - Bank of Hawaii Corp: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.23 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * BOARD OF DIRECTORS AUTHORIZES INCREASED DIVIDEND OF $0.60 PER SHARE * NET INTEREST INCOME, ON A TAXABLE-EQUIVALENT BASIS, FOR Q1 2018 WAS $120.3 MILLION, UP $7.4 MILLION * “GENERAL ECONOMIC CONDITIONS IN HAWAII REMAINED POSITIVE DURING” Q1 OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
